questions.question_text: Which of the following activities is NOT performed by the Auto Scaling policy?
questions.answer_description:
Auto Scaling policies can scale up or down based on the user-defined policies, health status checks or schedules. It also performs a health check on the instances, terminates unhealthy instances, and launches healthy instances to maintain the current instance level. Scaling provides you with options, outside of scaling policies, to override attributes from the instance and use the values that you need. For example, you can override the instance type using AWS CLI commands.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/latest/userguide/create-lc-with-instanceID.html

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Auto Scaling policies are responsible for automatically adjusting the number of instances in an Auto Scaling group based on predefined rules and conditions. However, they do not perform the task of changing instance types.
weird question. B and D are the same as A. You can scale out/in but not scale up/down e.g. go from t2.micro to t2.large on the fly.

comments.content: Scaling out / in has nothing to do with instance types, please refer to the theory behind scaling in/out and specifically in the context of AWS.

questions.question_text: Which of the following services is used to monitor the Amazon Web Services resources?
questions.answer_description:
AWS CloudWatch is a service used to monitor the AWS resources and the applications running on EC2. It collects and tracks the metrics of various services or applications.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/WhatIsCloudWatch.html

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
With Amazon Import/Export, users can ship their data stored on portable storage devices, such as hard drives or other supported storage media, to an AWS data center for import into AWS services. Similarly, users can export their data from AWS onto physical storage devices for secure transfer back to their premises.

questions.answer_description:
AWS Import/Export accelerates transferring large amounts of data between the AWS cloud and portable storage devices that you mail to us. AWS transfers data directly onto and off of your stor-age devices using Amazon high-speed internal network.
Reference:
http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSImportExport/latest/DG/whatisIE.html

choices.D: A software developed by Amazon to migrate the data from/to your datacenter to AWS
choices.A: A properly configured service role and instance profile
choices.B: An international shipping division to help you enhance your sales reach
choices.C: A service that accelerates transferring large amounts of data into and out of AWS using physical storage appliances

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
For applications with stable demand patterns, Auto Scaling helps maintain the desired number of instances based on the defined scaling policies. It can automatically adjust the number of instances to match the workload and ensure optimal resource utilization.

For applications that experience hourly, daily, or weekly variability in usage, Auto Scaling is particularly beneficial. It can dynamically scale the number of instances up or down to match the changing demand. This flexibility allows the application to handle peak loads efficiently while reducing costs during periods of lower demand.

choices.C: Both for applications that use frameworks and SDKs to enhance its customer relationship.
choices.D: only for applications with a stable usage pattern but extremely high workload.
choices.A: only for applications that experience hourly, daily, or weekly variability in usage.
choices.B: Both for applications that have stable demand patterns and that experience hourly, daily, or weekly variability in usage.

questions.answer_description:
Auto Scaling is well suited to both applications that have stable demand patterns and that experi-ence hourly, daily, or weekly variability in usage. Whether the demand is predictable or unpredicta-ble auto scaling can be a good choice. If the demand is predictable and long term you may choose reserved instances. If the demand is unpredictable you may choose on-demand or even spot instance (if you can afford to have an instance lost unexpectedly).
Reference:
http://aws.amazon.com/autoscaling/
questions.question_text: Which of the choices below best describes what Auto Scaling is well suited for?

choices.A: False, you can only import an existing domain using Amazon Route 53.
choices.B: True, however, it only provides .com domains.

questions.answer_description:
Amazon Route 53 provides highly available and scalable Domain Name System (DNS), domain name registration, and health-checking web services.
Reference:
http://aws.amazon.com/route53/faqs/
questions.question_text: True or False: Amazon Route 53 provides highly available and scalable Domain Name System (DNS), domain name registration, and health-checking web services.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
This is true
